byline.original: By MAGGIE HABERMAN and ALAN RAPPEPORT

headline.main: Donald Trump Continues to Stand by Corey Lewandowski’s Side

snippet: Donald J. Trump continued to defend his campaign manager, Corey Lewandowski, after the release of a videotape that showed he put a hand on a Breitbart News reporter he had previously denied touching.
abstract: Donald J. Trump continued to defend his campaign manager, Corey Lewandowski, after the release of a videotape that showed he put a hand on a Breitbart News reporter he had previously denied touching.
